official-title.#text:
To direct the Librarian of Congress to obtain a stained glass panel depicting the seal of the
			 District of Columbia and install the panel among the stained glass panels
			 depicting the seals of States which overlook the Main Reading Room of the
			 Library of Congress Thomas Jefferson Building.

header.#text:
Including stained glass panel depicting seal of District of Columbia in Library of Congress Thomas
